Source file src/github.com/TIBCOSoftware/flogo-contrib/action/flow/definition/expr.go

     1	package definition
     2	
     3	import "github.com/TIBCOSoftware/flogo-lib/core/data"
     4	
     5	// LinkExprManager interface that defines a Link Expression Manager
     6	type LinkExprManager interface {
     7	
     8		// EvalLinkExpr evaluate the link expression
     9		EvalLinkExpr(link *Link, scope data.Scope) (bool, error)
    10	}
    11	
    12	func NewLinkExprError(msg string) *LinkExprError {
    13		return &LinkExprError{msg: msg}
    14	}
    15	
    16	// LinkExprError thrown if error is encountered evaluating an link expression
    17	type LinkExprError struct {
    18		msg string
    19	}
    20	
    21	func (e *LinkExprError) Error() string {
    22		return e.msg
    23	}
    24	
    25	type LinkExprManagerFactory interface {
    26		NewLinkExprManager(def *Definition) LinkExprManager
    27	}
    28	
    29	var linkExprMangerFactory LinkExprManagerFactory
    30	
    31	func SetLinkExprManagerFactory(factory LinkExprManagerFactory) {
    32		linkExprMangerFactory = factory
    33	}
    34	
    35	func GetLinkExprManagerFactory() LinkExprManagerFactory {
    36		return linkExprMangerFactory
    37	}
    38	
    39	// GetExpressionLinks gets the links of the definition that are of type LtExpression
    40	func GetExpressionLinks(def *Definition) []*Link {
    41	
    42		var links []*Link
    43	
    44		getExpressionLinks(def.RootTask(), &links)
    45	
    46		if def.ErrorHandlerTask() != nil {
    47			getExpressionLinks(def.ErrorHandlerTask(), &links)
    48		}
    49	
    50		return links
    51	}
    52	
    53	// getExpressionLinks gets the links under the specified task that are of type LtExpression
    54	func getExpressionLinks(task *Task, links *[]*Link) {
    55	
    56		for _, link := range task.ChildLinks() {
    57	
    58			if link.Type() == LtExpression {
    59				*links = append(*links, link)
    60			}
    61		}
    62	
    63		for _, childTask := range task.ChildTasks() {
    64			getExpressionLinks(childTask, links)
    65		}
    66	}
    67
